_description: Moral counsels: do not be at strife with your betters, your fellows, or your subjects — one eight-line stanza

BodRawPoe32.First Lines:
Be clenly clad [ ]hym [ ] of [ ]Passe nat thi [ ]dis kepe thi pro[
                    ]…
BodRawPoe32.Last Lines:
…Wherfore pursue peas in all thi lifeLoue thi neighboures
                    & gate þe a good name
